verbs.description: replay review over [ARG1: base - keeping] needs to [V: go] umpires reviewed a play at second base in game 1 of the world series in which the dodgers claimed andrew benintendi hand came off the base these reviews are not in the spirit of the rule and only serve to slow the game down dodgers manny machado boston red sox supreme court justice potter stewart supreme court of the united states clayton kershaw baseball red sox andrew benintendi j d martinez austin barnes mookie betts los angeles dodgers jacobellis yasiel puig potter stewart ohio
